275 WBCs/mL, with 83% segmented neutrophils, 2% bands, 8% lymphocytes, 7% monocytes, and 377 RBCs/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CSF pleocytosis resolved by the 14th hospital day.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Delta-wave activity consistent with diffuse, severe encephalopathy.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Intermittent sharp contoured forms bitemporally with right-sided predominance observed on a second recording.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Severe right-sided cerebral edema with midline shift.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A second CT scan showed severe, worsened right-sided cerebral edema.
